analysis.description:
Reentrancy in A2ACrowdsale.mintETHRewards (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#383-387):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_contract.call.value(_amount)()) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#385)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- wingsETHRewards (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#386)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#48) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#50-52)

Reentrancy in A2ACrowdsale.ico (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#491-518):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalSold.add(tokensAmount) < token.maxSupply()) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#503)
	- require(bool)(token.issueDuringICO(_to,tokensAmount)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#504)
	- require(bool)(token.issueDuringICO(bountyAddress,tokensAmount.mul(bountyPercent) / 1000000)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#510)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#514)
	- totalSold (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#515)

Reentrancy in A2ACrowdsale.mintTokenRewards (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#389-394):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.issueDuringICO(_contract,_amount)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#392)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- wingsTokenRewards (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#393)

A2ACrowdsale.withdrawToFounders has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! foundersAddresses[i].send(amount_to_withdraw) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#541-543)

A2ACrowdsalePartner.withdrawToFounders has external calls inside a loop:

A2ACrowdsale.start (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#400-410) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_startTimestamp >= block.timestamp) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#402)

A2ACrowdsale.isFailed (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#413-424) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (started && block.timestamp >= endTimestamp && totalCollected < minimalGoal) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#414-423)

A2ACrowdsale.isActive (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#427-439) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (started && totalCollected < hardCap && block.timestamp >= startTimestamp && block.timestamp < endTimestamp) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#428-438)

elements.expression: (started && totalCollected < hardCap && block.timestamp >= startTimestamp && block.timestamp < endTimestamp)

analysis.description:
A2ACrowdsale.isSuccessful (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#442-450) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (totalCollected >= hardCap || (block.timestamp >= endTimestamp && totalCollected >= minimalGoal)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/18170.sol#443-449)
